com.cerner.bunsen.spark

Class ValueSetUdfs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cerner.bunsen.spark.ValueSetUdfs

  • public class ValueSetUdfs
extends Object
    Support for user-defined functions that use valuesets. This class offers users a stack to push and pop valuesets used in the in_valuesets UDF, allowing callers to temporarily override valuesets and then simply pop them to revert to the previous state.

    The in_valueset UDF allows the user to check whether a given CodeableConcept (or sequence of CodeableConcepts) have a Coding field in a ValueSet specified by a Reference name. It can be called SparkSQL as in_valueset(codeProperty, 'Reference').
